sentences: how much battery (does <name> have [left]|has <name> got [left]|is left in <name>)
tell me the[ current] status of <name>[ in <area>][ <currently>]
(do you know|tell me) if there are any {on_off_domains:domain} {on_off_states:state} [in <area>]
[how much ]time[ is] left on[ the| my] timer[s]
[how much ]time[ is] left on[ the| my] <timer_start> timer
status of[ the| my] timer[s] in <area>
[how much ]time[ is] left on[ the| my] {area} timer
[how much ]time[ is] left on[ the| my] timer[s] in <area>
[how much ]time[ is] left on[ the| my] {timer_name:name} timer
add <timer_duration> to[ the| my] timer for <timer_start>
add <timer_duration> to[ the| my] timer in <area>
increase[ the| my] timer for <timer_start> by <timer_duration>
increase[ the| my] timer in <area> by <timer_duration>
remove <timer_duration> from[ the| my] timer for <timer_start>
remove <timer_duration> from[ the| my] timer in <area>
decrease[ the| my] timer for <timer_start> by <timer_duration>
decrease[ the| my] timer in <area> by <timer_duration>
how (hot | cold | warm | cool) is it [in <area>]

errors.no_area: Sorry, I am not aware of any area called {{ area }}
errors.no_floor: Sorry, I am not aware of any floor called {{ floor }}
errors.no_domain: Sorry, I am not aware of any {{ domain }}
errors.no_domain_in_area: Sorry, I am not aware of any {{ domain }} in the {{ area }} area
errors.no_domain_in_floor: Sorry, I am not aware of any {{ domain }} on the {{ floor }} floor
errors.no_device_class: Sorry, I am not aware of any {{ device_class }}
errors.no_device_class_in_area: Sorry, I am not aware of any {{ device_class }} in the {{ area }} area
errors.no_device_class_in_floor: Sorry, I am not aware of any {{ device_class }} in the {{ floor }} floor
errors.no_entity: Sorry, I am not aware of any device called {{ entity }}
errors.no_entity_in_area: Sorry, I am not aware of any device called {{ entity }} in the {{ area }} area
errors.no_entity_in_floor: Sorry, I am not aware of any device called {{ entity }} in the {{ floor }} floor
errors.entity_wrong_state: Sorry, no device is {{ state | lower }}
errors.feature_not_supported: Sorry, no device supports the required features
errors.no_entity_in_area_exposed: Sorry, {{ entity }} in the {{ area }} area is not exposed
errors.no_entity_in_floor_exposed: Sorry, {{ entity }} in the {{ floor }} floor is not exposed
errors.no_domain_in_area_exposed: Sorry, no {{ domain }} in the {{ area }} area is exposed
errors.no_domain_in_floor_exposed: Sorry, no {{ domain }} in the {{ floor }} floor is exposed
errors.no_device_class_in_area_exposed: Sorry, no {{ device_class }} in the {{ area }} area is exposed
errors.no_device_class_in_floor_exposed: Sorry, no {{ device_class }} in the {{ floor }} floor is exposed
errors.duplicate_entities: Sorry, there are multiple devices called {{ entity }}
errors.duplicate_entities_in_area: Sorry, there are multiple devices called {{ entity }} in the {{ area }} area
errors.duplicate_entities_in_floor: Sorry, there are multiple devices called {{ entity }} in the {{ floor }} floor
errors.timer_not_found: Sorry, I couldn't find that timer
errors.multiple_timers_matched: Sorry, I am unable to target multiple timers
errors.no_timer_support: Sorry, timers are not supported on this device

HassTurnOff.light_all: Turned off all of the lights
HassTurnOff.fan_all: Turned off all of the fans

HassTurnOn.light_all: Turned on all of the lights

HassGetCurrentTime.default:
{% set minute_str = '{0:02d}'.format(slots.time.minute) %}
{% if slots.time.hour <= 12: %} {{ slots.time.hour }}:{{ minute_str }} AM {% else: %} {{ slots.time.hour - 12 }}:{{ minute_str }} PM {% endif %}

HassGetWeather.default:
{% set weather_condition = {
  'clear': 'and clear',
  'clear-night': 'and clear',
  'cloudy': 'and cloudy',
  'exceptional': 'and exceptional',
  'fog': 'with fog',
  'hail': 'with hail',
  'lightning': 'with lightning',
  'lightning-rainy': 'with lightning and rain',
  'partlycloudy': 'and partly cloudy',
  'pouring': 'and pouring rain',
  'rainy': 'and raining',
  'snowy': 'and snowing',
  'snowy-rainy': 'with snow and rain',
  'sunny': 'and sunny',
  'windy': 'and windy',
  'windy-variant': 'with wind and clouds'
} %} {{ state.attributes.get('temperature') }} {{ state.attributes.get('temperature_unit') }} {{ weather_condition.get((state.state | string).lower(), "") }}

HassClimateGetTemperature.default: {% set temperature = state_attr(state.entity_id, 'current_temperature') %} {% if temperature == 1: %} {{ temperature }} degree {% else: %} {{ temperature }} degrees {% endif %}

expansion_rules.name: [the ]{name}
expansion_rules.everywhere: (everywhere|in (all|each)[[ of] the] room[s]|in every room[s]|in the <home>)
expansion_rules.timer_duration_minutes: ({timer_minutes:minutes} minute[s][ [and ]{timer_seconds:seconds} second[s]])|({timer_minutes:minutes} and[ a] {timer_half:seconds} minute[s])|({timer_half:seconds} a minute[s])
expansion_rules.timer_duration_hours: ({timer_hours:hours} hour[s][ [and ]{timer_minutes:minutes} minute[s]][ [and ]{timer_seconds:seconds} second[s]])|({timer_hours:hours} and[ a] {timer_half:minutes} hour[s])|({timer_half:minutes} an hour[s])
